document.full_text: minnesota timberwolves coach kurt rambis says there's a chance that the all-star forward kevin love could miss the rest of the season because of a strained left groin.
document.title: rambis: 'outside chance' love's season may be over
lines_and_colors: minnesota timberwolves coach kurt rambis says there's a chance that the all-star forward kevin love could miss the rest of the season because of a strained left groin.
